description:
Yuga meets Subaru, a brilliant but standoffish schoolmate known as the Ace of Study. At Ranma`s suggestion, Yuga and Subaru face off in a friendly Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash of the Aces! Ace of Games versus Ace of Study!
Gekitotsu! Asobi no Kami VS Benkyou no Kami!!
激突! 遊びの神VS勉強の神!!
